column2: Biggest California earthquake in two decades ruptured on at least 24 faults
column3: When an earthquake strikes, the instinct of many Californians is to ask: Which fault ruptured - the Newport-Inglewood, the Hayward, the mighty San Andreas? But scientists are increasingly saying it's not that simple.

column2: Cranes remove bus partially swallowed by Pittsburgh sinkhole
column3: A bus that was partially swallowed when a sinkhole opened during morning rush hour in downtown Pittsburgh has been removed from the hole. Authorities said earlier Monday that two cranes arrived to remove the city bus.
